metadata.title: CVE-2017-17506 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In HDF5 1.10.1, there is an out of bounds read vulnerability in thefunction H5Opline_pline_decode in H5Opline.c in libhdf5.a. For example,h5dump would crash when someone opens a crafted hdf5 file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
